expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Reference:
Sugden DE, Balco G, Cowdery SG, Stone JO, Sass LC, 2005. Selective glacial erosion and weathering zones in the coastal mountains of Marie Byrd Land, Antarctica. Geomorphology 67, 317-334.

Data comments:
Data derived from the ICE-D database (http://antarctica.ice-d.org/).
Sampling year based on sample names.
